narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: 24hr Homecare is a Technician, Personal Care Attendant provider based in El Segundo, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $40.2M in Medicaid payments across 196K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $40.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
